name: HeliCaveCopter
description:
So, where should I start? This game is my second game, I have begun to work on it after I didn't succeed in marketing my first game.

I made it in two months knowing I won't have more time as I'm starting some really time-consuming studies. This game will be in fact my last game until 2019.

It isn't some fancy, incredible and high-paced game. The gameplay isn't new. However, I put a lot of work in it to make something consistent. I learned a lot from my first game, and this was the occasion to put this knowledge at work. I think the result is good enough considering the time I had and the relative novelty of game development for me.

Just try it, post a comment and share it if you liked it.

I hope you'll have some kind of fun whether you play it 2 minutes or an hour, alone or with a friend.

To make it clear, I probably won't post any update for this game. I know it could have been way better but I don't feel like spending more time on it. I've got a lot of other game ideas for when my studies will be over.

Maybe I'll upload it to the Play Store.
